New Records: The Cavaliers are 10-0 against conference opponents, with Evan Mobley averaging 12.6 points in the paint.
The Bulls are ninth in the Eastern Conference, with Nikola Vucevic averaging 12.3 points in the paint.
Key Match Events: The Cavaliers average 15.3 made 3-pointers per game, 2.5 more than the Bulls allow.
The Bulls shoot 46.5% from the field, 0.5% higher than the Cavaliers' opponents this season.
Pre-Game Insights: The Cavaliers seek their 7th straight home win.
The Bulls are 1-1 against Central Division opponents, averaging 114.1 points per game.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Donovan Mitchell scores 23.6 points per game for the Cavaliers.
Vucevic averages 20.7 points, 10.2 rebounds, and 3.2 assists for the Bulls.
Others: The Cavaliers have a 119.9 average points per game, while the Bulls average 114.1 points.
Injuries: Emoni Bates (knee) and Max Strus (ankle) are out for the Cavaliers; Lonzo Ball (wrist) and Adama Sanogo (knee) are out for the Bulls.
